title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: Ramsay House, which was her dowry residence, is unsurpassed in the richness of its furniture and in those gorgeous and costly fittings which mark the home of wealth and taste. In extent it is a palace, and is built in one of the finest parks in the world.

title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: It is for you to determine, Lady Barnton. I either leave Ramsay House your foe, or your friend and—agent. Reflect for a moment.

title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: The corpse had been removed to Ramsay House, and on the appointed day was carried with great pomp to the burial-place in the old churchyard of Cramond.
